tool_description: Designs electrical layout including lighting, outlets, ventilation, and GFCI requirements according to electrical codes and user preferences.

lighting_zones.description: Desired lighting areas: general, vanity, shower, accent

ventilation_type.description: Ventilation system: ceiling-fan, wall-fan, or inline-fan

error_messages: Invalid lighting zones: Use combinations of general, vanity, shower, accent.
Invalid outlet count: Must specify between 1 and 6 outlets.
Invalid ventilation type: Use ceiling-fan, wall-fan, or inline-fan.
Electrical load exceeded: Proposed electrical load exceeds typical circuit capacity.
usage: Specify lighting zones, outlet count, and ventilation type. Optionally add heated flooring and smart switches. The tool creates a code-compliant electrical layout.

circuit_requirements.description: Required electrical circuits and their specifications

gfci_locations.description: Required GFCI outlet and breaker locations
